attributes.action: Give Britain a referendum to accept the negotiated EU exit deal before leaving
attributes.additional_details:
Reference : The referendum vote to leave the EU held on June 23rd, 2016
Ask the British public to approve the negotiated conditions for Brexit and show that it is beneficial to the UK's future prosperity
Eliminate the possibility of having being fed exaggerations, half truths or mistaken beliefs!
attributes.background: Whether you voted to Remain or "Brexit" the EU, the exit terms are now the most crucial factors in determining the advisability of our departure . Allegations that each side were guilty of half-truths and lies were commonplace.
